Andy Lee wrote:
> Hi guys, when using NutchWax to search the ARC file. If I want to save 
> the search result of a query string,

You want to save the search result page everytime a query is run?

Study the search.jsp in a checkout of the nutchwax source or study the 
NutchwaxOpenSearchServlet if you are returning results as XML: 
http://archive-access.sourceforge.net/projects/nutch/apidocs/org/archive/access/nutch/NutchwaxOpenSearchServlet.html.  
You'll either want to add serializing the search results that come back 
inside your own version of search.jsp or subclass 
NutchwaxOpenSearchServlet to add similar.

FYI: This is the Heritrix mailing list.  In future, you'd be better off 
addressing NutchWAX questions to the NutchWAX mailing list:  
http://archive-access.sourceforge.net/projects/nutch/mail-lists.html

Thanks,
St.Ack
